name: OnlyOneConductor
description:
A zachtronics style game about building circuits using only one conductor™, and only one logic gate.

Inspired by KOHCTPYKTOP: Engineer of the People by Zach barth, my game explores the possibilities of a simple system, and only one component, the NAND gate.

Paint circuits using one conductor with my current path mechanic. Includes 7 Levels that will make you scratch your head.
